message.content:
cs.DS, cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with optimization problems in Approval Voting systems, which are commonly studied in the fields of computational social choice (cs.GT) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of PTAS algorithms suggests a focus on computational complexity and algorithms (cs.DS), while the adaptation of techniques from the Closest String problem suggests a possible connection to computational biology (cs.CC). Finally, the use of structural properties of subsets of votes suggests a possible connection to machine learning and data analysis (cs.LG).
